Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class WQServer extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • database

          WQDatabase database
          The database used to store user data across restarts.

        • tPool

          java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor tPool
          The threadpool used for task execution. The number of threads is currently hardcoded to four as most cpus nowadays have two cores with four threads.

        • serverSelector

          java.nio.channels.Selector serverSelector
          The selector used for clients' sockets multiplexing.

        • serverChannel

          java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel serverChannel
          The ServerSocketChannel accepting new connection requests.

        • portNumber

          int portNumber
          The port on which the ServerSocketChannel is opened, its value is passed to the WQServer via the constructor method.

        • onlineUsers

          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<K,V> onlineUsers
          ConcurrentHashMap used by WQServer to track online users. Associates users' nicknames to the server port number on which the connection with each user is taking place. Also used to check if the requested operation is permitted during task execution.

        • onlineIPs

          java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<K,V> onlineIPs
          ConcurrentHashMap used by WQServer to track online users' IP addresses that will be used for UDP communication purposes. Associates an username to an IP address. Used to send match invitations.

        • matchDuration

          int matchDuration
          Match duration in minutes. It's an int stating how many minutes a match shall last. Passed to the constructor method.

        • acceptDuration

          int acceptDuration
          Match invitation timeout. specifies how many seconds a match invitation shall remain valid. Passed to the constructor method.

        • numWords

          int numWords
          Specifies how many words the server shall provide to the players for translation. Passed to the constructor method.
